news.title: Full Video: Trump-Zelenskyy Oval Office meeting explodes into shouting match
news.summary: President Donald Trump and Vice President JD Vance argued with Ukraine President Volodymyr Zelenskyy. Vance accused Zelensyy of disrespect.

news.title: The first quarter is on track for negative GDP growth, Atlanta Fed indicator says
news.summary: Gross domestic product is on pace to shrink by 1.5%. The central bank's GDPNow tracker of incoming metrics is indicating that.

news.title: Trump administration, Musk’s DOGE plan to fire nearly all CFPB staff and wind down agency, employees say
news.summary: Employees testified that CFPB leaders and Elon Musk's DOGE want to wind down the agency to five employees, the minimum required under law.

news.title: Amazon eyes global expansion for its Temu, Shein competitor
news.summary: Amazon's Haul is a collection of products that are often priced at or below $20. Amazon debuted Haul last year, offering makeup, apparel, accessories and other items.

news.title: Intel delays Ohio chip plant opening to next decade, was supposed to start production by 2026
news.summary: Intel is pushing off the opening of its Ohio chip manufacturing facility, the embattled chipmaker said Friday. Intel: The opening of the Ohio facility will be later this year.

news.title: Why Trump’s ‘gold card’ visa program could make the pricey U.S. housing market even more expensive
news.summary: An influx of immigrants who pay $5 million for a visa could increase demand in the “ultrahigh end of the real-estate market,” says a National Association of Realtors economist.

news.title: Wall Street can’t stop talking about the ‘Mar-a-Lago Accord’. Here’s how the currency deal would work.
news.summary: A theory about how the Trump administration could restructure the international financial system to better serve American interests is starting to be taken seriously on Wall Street.

news.title: ‘I’m an endless honey pot’: My wife and I are in our 70s. We gave our son $40,000 for his L.A. wedding. Now he wants more.
news.summary: “We financed three of them through college, so none of our kids have student loans,” his wife says. “We have four sons. We financed three and we’re going to finance four more.”

news.title: Trump’s trade war has rattled investors — uncertainty is a call to action
news.summary: Lack of clarity on what’s ahead should, if we’re smart, enhance our financial-planning skills.

news.title: U.S. stocks had a rocky February under Trump’s return. Should investors be worried about March?
news.summary: The U.S. stock market has been in a rollercoaster ride this year. The market has taken a number of twists and turns over the past few months.
